subdisciplines.name: Oral history
subdisciplines.description: The study of historical information gathered through recorded interviews with people who have firsthand experiences or knowledge of past events.

subdisciplines.name: Archives
subdisciplines.description: The science of collecting, categorizing, preserving, and providing access to documents and materials that have historical or cultural significance.

subdisciplines.name: Historic preservation
subdisciplines.description: The practice of protecting and preserving historic buildings, landscapes, and other artifacts of cultural heritage.
